cab.content:
SECRET.
BATTLE SITUATION - NOON - 9th SEPTEMBER, 1918.
1. WESTERN FRONT.
(a) British Front.
On the Somme Front yesterday we took SOYECOURT and our patrols are in VERMAND and VENDELLES and around HESBECOURT. Otherwise no change.
(b) French Front.
Last night the French had taken VAUAILLON south of the river AILETTE.
North of the OISE they hold FARGNIER and QUESSY and have patrols towards LA FERE.
North of the Somme they hold ARTEMPS and LE HAMEL.
2. ITALIAN AND MACEDONIAN FRONTS.
There is nothing to report.
General Staff,
War Office, S.W.1.
9th September, 1918.
Issued at 12.30 p.m.
